DOC.brief_summary: The objective study know safety Hib/PRP-T vaccine immediate reaction within first 30 minute injection .
DOC.detailed_description: This trial open-label study , randomization , placebo control group . Total 25 young healthy adult ( volunteer ) follow trial . The safety assess within 24 hour , 48 hour , 72 hour , 28 day injection .
DOC.criteria: Adult ( age 18 40 year old ) Provision write informed consent Good health accord clinical investigator Willingness ability adhere regimen study Known enrol study Pregnancy lactation Known suspect allergy vaccine component ( medical history ) History unusual reaction previous vaccination Known suspect immune deficiency , use medication may influence immune system Prior respiratory infection Other vaccination study , one week ( inactivated vaccine ) one month ( live vaccine ) study Acute febrile illness ( temperature > 37.5 Celsius ) Present evidence serious disease demand medical treatment Any significant congenital chronic disorder
